name: Cali Roll
description: 'Crab', cucumber, and avocado (Regular or spicy).

name: Philly Roll
description: Vegan cream cheese, yam, cucumber, and teriyaki sauce.

name: Yammon Roll
description: Sweet yam with teriyaki sauce.

name: Kappa Roll
description: Creamy avocado and crunchy cucumber. (Add cream cheese for $.50.)

name: Pillar Roll
description: Inside: Teriyaki flavored shitake mushroom, yam and cucumber. Outside: avocado, sesame and teriyaki sauce. A customer favorite!

name: Aloha Roll
description: Inside: Pineapple, 'ham', and onion tempura. Outside: Sesame, teriyaki sauce, and vegan spicy aioli.

name: Club Roll
description: Lettuce, avocado, 'ham', and onion tempura. Served with a house sauce (regular or spicy).

name: Fire Roll
description: Tofu, cucumber, jalapenos, osinko, and Korean hot sauce.

name: TJ Roll
description: Jalapenos, cilantro, cucumber, and 'shrimp' tempura topped with vegan spicy mayo, crispy wonton skins, and pickled carrot.

name: BBQ Roll
description: Inside: Avocado, cucumber, onion tempura, and 'chicken'. Outside: Cashews, carrots, and BBQ sauce. (Add pineapple for $.50.)

name: Hand Roll
description: 'Ham,' avocado, lettuce, and cucumber wrapped in a raw nori sheet.

name: Thai Roll
description: 'Chicken,' lettuce, cabbage, carrot, and peanut sauce

name: Living Roll
description: Lettuce, cucumber, carrots, bean sprouts, cabbage and, cilantro.

name: Combo
description: Choose any three baby rolls, hand rolls, or combination of the two for a discount.

name: Hand Roll
description: Lettuce, cucumber, 'chicken', and BBQ sauce.

name: Vietnamese Soup
description: A healthy blend of vegetables, tofu triangles or 'chicken', and rice noodles in a homemade clear vegetable broth.

name: Udon Soup
description: A traditional Vietnamese 'beef' noodle soup with your choice of 'beef' strips or veggie 'meatballs.' Served with: hoisin sauce; hot sauce; and a plate of bean sprouts, basil, and lemon.

name: Cha Siu Soup
description: Our house blend of mixed vegetables topped with traditional Chinese style BBQ 'pork.' Substitute egg-less 'egg' noodles if you prefer!

name: Fire Noodlez
description: Udon noodles pan fried with carrots, broccoli, bok choy, celery, and bean sprouts in our chef's spicy house sauce.

name: Drunken Noodlez
description: Big flat rice noodles wok fried with carrots, bean sprouts, celery, onions, and broccoli. Made with a light sauce, this dish really captures the smoky flavor of the wok.

name: Tangy Orange
description: Our house orange sauce with fresh orange slices. Customer favorite! GF Add broccoli or mixed vegetables for $1 more!

name: Broccoli Stir Fry
description: A dish that's sure to please the broccoli lover. Delicious with our 'beef'.

name: Sweet and Sour
description: A tangy sweet and sour sauce that includes carrots, bell peppers, celery, onions and pineapple. GF

name: Steam Bowl
description: A popular request of steamed tofu, broccoli, bok choy, carrots, shitake mushrooms and cabbage. Served with brown rice.

name: Teriyaki
description: Served with broccoli and rice on a bed of steamed cabbage.

name: Spicy Basil
description: An absolute favorite! Thai basil stir-fried with cabbage, baby bok choy, button mushrooms, celery, and carrots in our homemade basil sauce. Customer favorite!

name: House Tofu
description: Taiwanese tofu stir-fried with snow peas, celery, carrots, and bell peppers in our house spicy sauce.

name: Thai Curry
description: A flavorful coconut yellow curry dish with eggplant, potatoes, onions, bell peppers, and button mushrooms. Customer favorite!

name: Black Bean
description: Taiwanese tofu stir-fried with carrots, onions, and bell peppers in a spicy black bean sauce.

name: Salt and Pepper
description: The most popular dish with our servers! Crispy or steamed tofu flash-fried with garlic, scallions, and jalapenos on a bed of romaine lettuce accompanied by steamed broccoli. (Also delicious with our tempura battered 'shrimp' for $2 more.)

name: Oat Bar
description: A perfectly crumbled bottom topped with oats and held together by a sweet raspberry center.

name: Coconut Bar
description: A crumbly bottom topped with coconut shavings, walnuts, and chocolate.

name: Banana Cake
description: Served with warm coconut cream and crushed peanuts.

name: Our Homemade Cake
description: Chocolate, Carrot, Red Velvet, and Toasted Coconut.

name: Thai Sweet Rice
description: Served with warm coconut cream and crushed peanuts. Gluten Free

name: Stuffed Coconut
description: A whole young coconut stuffed with sweet rice, mung beans, and warm coconut cream, topped with salty crushed peanuts.

name: Cheesecake
description: Our own super yummy Vegan 'Cheese Cake' served plain or with raspberry or chocolate sauce.

name: Brownie Sundae
description: A warm homemade brownie topped with your choice of soy or dairy vanilla ice cream and drizzled with chocolate sauce.

name: Homemade Cookies
description: Oatmeal Raisin, Chocolate Chip, or Peanut Butter.

name: Iced Tea
description: Green or Jasmine.

name: Hot Tea
description: Green or Jasmine.

name: Soda
description: Coke, Diet Coke, Orange, Root Beer, Sprite, or Dr. Pepper.

name: Italian Soda
description: Strawberry or Cherry

name: Chai Latte
description: Vanilla or Spiced

name: Smoothies
description: Avocado, Strawberry, Strawberry-Banana, Mixed Berry, Mango or dairy free Green.

name: Milk Tea
description: Strawberry, Mango, Honey Dew, Banana, Watermelon, Peach, Taro, Original Milk, Jasmine, Chai (Spiced or Vanilla), or Thai Iced Tea.

name: Milk Slushees
description: Green Tea, Honey Dew, Taro, Mocha, Mocha Coconut or Pina Colada.

name: Slushees
description: Strawberry, Mango, Lychee, Peach, Green Apple, Pineapple, Watermelon or Passionfruit.
